Notes
1. Fees include media cost (9-track tape or floppy
diskettes). 2. Floppy diskettes limited to orders of 5 diskettes or less. All larger orders on 9-track tape. 3. CLASS graphics files not to be sold for areas where County

Base Map files exist. 4. Fees for Raster 1:24,000 Quads are cumulative (i.e., first
quad in order not discounted on larger orders, quads 2-200 not discounted

1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
